title: The Bargaining Chronicles of Pit Coleman

story.text: Pit Coleman discovered his unique ability to manipulate time after accidentally reversing a day during a particularly stressful final exam. Intrigued and cautious, he started testing his powers in small, inconspicuous ways.

Having mastered the basics of time manipulation, Pit decided to leverage his abilities for good. He stumbled upon a robbery and, by rewinding time by mere minutes, managed to alert the authorities in time to prevent it.

Fuelled by yesterday’s success, Pit decided to tackle a bigger challenge. He found out about a negotiation between local community leaders and a stubborn property developer. By carefully rewinding and adjusting the conversation, he helped them reach a beneficial agreement.
Pit’s continuous use of his powers started drawing attention. Unbeknownst to him, a mysterious organization began monitoring his activities, intrigued by his abilities.

Conflict arose when the organization confronted Pit. They demanded that he stop using his powers for public interventions, warning him of the dangers of altering time. Refusing to comply, Pit escaped using a quick time jump.

After evading the organization, Pit dedicated his day to refining his control over time, realizing that with greater power comes greater responsibility. He practiced reversing only seconds to minimize unintended consequences.

Pit decided to use his writing skills to document his experiences and the ethical dilemmas he faced. He started a blog under a pseudonym, sharing stories and lessons learned about the complexities of power and responsibility.

ending: Thus, Pit Coleman became a guardian of time, always vigilant and forever ready to bargain for the greater good.
moral: With great power comes not only great responsibility but also the duty to negotiate wisely for the common good.
